title: Definition of the General Form
text: The general form has the formula $$g(x)={ax}^2+bx+c$$.
speech: The general form has the formula  g of x is equal to a x squared, plus b x plus c .
pacedSpeech: The general form has the formula   g of x is equal to a x squared, plus b x plus c

title: Definition of the Standard Form
speech: The standard form is  g of x is equal to a, parentheses x minus h,  squared plus k .
pacedSpeech: The standard form is   g of x is equal to a,  x minus h,  squared plus k
